testcase.classname: Users are listed from highest score to lowest, and when
testcase.name: A user sends a higher number of right attempts and
testcase.system-out: When the user john_snow sends 2 right attempts..............................passed And the user peter sends 1 right attempts...................................passed Then the user john_snow is the number 1 on the leaderboard..................passed And the user peter is the number 2 on the leaderboard.......................passed

testcase.classname: Users are listed from highest score to lowest, and when
testcase.name: A user passes another one when gets higher score.
testcase.system-out: Given the user john_snow sends 3 right attempts.............................passed And the user peter sends 2 right attempts...................................passed And the user john_snow is the number 1 on the leaderboard...................passed When the user peter sends 2 right attempts..................................passed Then the user peter is the number 1 on the leaderboard......................passed And the user john_snow is the number 2 on the leaderboard...................passed
